channel.title: Would this make Hosting better?
channel.description:
I'm so tired, every time the server decides to generate 20 nulls, I get this in my No-Ip and my server crashes.
This is how it looks:
[IMG]http://i94.photobucket.com/albums/l82/lilgenius095/Stupid.png[/img]
Sorry for the quality, saved as .jpg by accident.
So, if I were to uninstall DUC, would I still be able to host without the IP's crashing? Or do I need DUC? Cause one time, someone said it was useless...
Alright, thanks.

item.title: Would this make Hosting better?

item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

Oh ok lol. Cause back a while ago, someone said that the DUC is useless…

Read full topic
